# BUGLIST

	>>> from yaxl import *
	>>> x = Element('x')
	>>> x['xmlns'] = 'http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml'
	>>> x
	<x xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
	>>> x.localname = 'html'
	>>> x
	<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
	>>> x = Element('x')
	>>> x['xmlns'] = 'http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml'
	>>> x
	<x xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
	>>> x.qname = 'html'
	Traceback (most recent call last):
		...
	TypeError: read-only attribute
